rdf:about="https://plone.org/products/plone/security/advisories/eea-factednavigation-vulnerability">     <title>eea.facetednavigation vulnerability requires immediate upgrade</title>     <link>https://plone.org/products/plone/security/advisories/eea-factednavigation-vulnerability</link>     <description>A medium severity vulnerability in the popular add-on product EEA Faceted Navigation.</description>          <dc:publisher>No publisher</dc:publisher>     <dc:creator></dc:creator>     <dc:rights></dc:rights>     <dc:date>2014-01-29T11:27:06Z</dc:date>     <dc:type>News Item</dc:type>   </item>     <item rdf:about="https://plone.org/products/plone/security/advisories/20131210-preannounce">     <title>20131210 - Pre-announcement of hotfix</title>     <link>https://plone.org/products/plone/security/advisories/20131210-preannounce</link>     <description>In keeping with our new policy of 4-monthly hotfixes, we are announcing the planned release of a security fix on Tuesday 10th December 2013.</description>          <dc:publisher>No publisher</dc:publisher>     <dc:creator></dc:creator>     <dc:rights></dc:rights> <title>20130618 Hotfix update posted</title>     <link>https://plone.org/products/plone/security/advisories/20130618-hotfix-update-posted</link>     <description>Version 1.3 of 20130618 released.</description>          <dc:publisher>No publisher</dc:publisher>     <dc:creator></dc:creator>     <dc:rights></dc:rights>     <dc:date>2013-07-02T13:50:09Z</dc:date>     <dc:type>News rdf:about="https://plone.org/products/plone/security/advisories/20130618-announcement">     <title>Security vulnerability announcement: 20130618 - Multiple vectors</title>     <link>https://plone.org/products/plone/security/advisories/20130618-announcement</link>     <description>Patches to Zope and Plone for a variety of issues, including arbitrary code execution and privilege escalation. </description>          <dc:publisher>No publisher</dc:publisher>     <dc:creator></dc:creator>     <dc:rights></dc:rights>     <dc:date>2013-06-12T10:30:00Z</dc:date>     <dc:type>News Item</dc:type>   </item>     <item rdf:about="https://plone.org/products/plone/security/advisories/ploneformgen-vulnerability-requires-immediate-upgrade">     <title>PloneFormGen vulnerability requires immediate upgrade</title>     <link>https://plone.org/products/plone/security/advisories/ploneformgen-vulnerability-requires-immediate-upgrade</link>     <description>PloneFormGen, a widely used response-form-creation add-on for the Plone Content Management System, has been discovered to have a serious vulnerability that allows an anonymous attacker to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the system user running the server.</description>          <dc:publisher>No publisher</dc:publisher>     <dc:creator></dc:creator>     <dc:rights></dc:rights>     <dc:date>2013-05-29T22:40:00Z</dc:date>     <dc:type>Document</dc:type>   </item>     <item rdf:about="https://plone.org/products/plone/security/advisories/20121106-announcement">     <title>Security vulnerability: 20121106 - Multiple vectors</title>     <link>https://plone.org/products/plone/security/advisories/20121106-announcement</link>     <description>Patches to Zope and Plone for a variety of issues, including arbitrary code execution and privilege escalation.</description>          <dc:publisher>No publisher</dc:publisher>     <dc:creator></dc:creator>     <dc:rights></dc:rights>     <dc:date>2012-11-06T00:00:00Z</dc:date>     <dc:type>News Item</dc:type>   </item>     <item rdf:about="https://plone.org/products/plone/security/advisories/security-announcement-zope-hotfix-20111024">     <title>Security announcement: Zope Hotfix 20111024</title>     <link>https://plone.org/products/plone/security/advisories/security-announcement-zope-hotfix-20111024</link>     <description>The latest Zope security announcement does not affect most Plone installations.</description>          <dc:publisher>No publisher</dc:publisher>     <dc:creator></dc:creator>     <dc:rights></dc:rights>     <dc:date>2011-10-27T21:27:30Z</dc:date>     <dc:type>News Item</dc:type>   </item>     <item rdf:about="https://plone.org/products/plone/security/advisories/20110928">     <title>Security vulnerability announcement: 20110928 - Arbitrary Code Execution</title>     <link>https://plone.org/products/plone/security/advisories/20110928</link>     <description>A vulnerability in Zope 2.12.x and Zope 2.13.x that allows execution of arbitrary code by anonymous users.</description>          <dc:publisher>No publisher</dc:publisher>     <dc:creator></dc:creator>     <dc:rights></dc:rights>     <dc:date>2011-09-28T20:30:00Z</dc:date>     <dc:type>News Item</dc:type>   </item>     <item rdf:about="https://plone.org/products/plone/security/advisories/CVE-2011-2528">     <title>Security vulnerability announcement: CVE-2011-2528 \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd Privilege escalation</title>     <link>https://plone.org/products/plone/security/advisories/CVE-2011-2528</link>     <description>A highly serious vulnerability in Zope that allows unauthorised access</description>          <dc:publisher>No publisher</dc:publisher>     <dc:creator></dc:creator>     <dc:rights></dc:rights>     <dc:date>2011-06-28T12:00:00Z</dc:date>     <dc:type>News Item</dc:type>   </item>     <item rdf:about="https://plone.org/products/plone/security/advisories/hotfix-error-hotfix20110531-version-1">     <title>Hotfix Error: Hotfix20110531 version 1.0 is incomplete</title>     <link>https://plone.org/products/plone/security/advisories/hotfix-error-hotfix20110531-version-1</link>     <description>A critical flaw has been found in version 1.0 of Hotfix20110531, an update is now available</description>          <dc:publisher>No publisher</dc:publisher>     <dc:creator></dc:creator>     <dc:rights></dc:rights>     <dc:date>2011-06-02T16:45:45Z</dc:date>     <dc:type>News Item</dc:type>   </item>     <item rdf:about="https://plone.org/products/plone/security/advisories/CVE-2011-1950">     <title>Security vulnerability announcement: CVE-2011-1950 \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd An escalation of privileges attack</title>     <link>https://plone.org/products/plone/security/advisories/CVE-2011-1950</link>     <description>A vulnerability in plone.app.users affecting Plone 4.0 and 4.1.</description>          <dc:publisher>No publisher</dc:publisher>     <dc:creator></dc:creator>     <dc:rights></dc:rights>     <dc:date>2011-06-01T15:50:00Z</dc:date>     <dc:type>News Item</dc:type>   </item>     <item rdf:about="https://plone.org/products/plone/security/advisories/CVE-2011-1949">     <title>Security vulnerability announcement: CVE-2011-1949 \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd A persistent cross site scripting vulnerability</title>     <link>https://plone.org/products/plone/security/advisories/CVE-2011-1949</link>     <description>A vulnerability in Plone versions using Products.PortalTransforms, including Plone 2.1 through 4.1.</description>          <dc:publisher>No publisher</dc:publisher>     <dc:creator></dc:creator>     <dc:rights></dc:rights>     <dc:date>2011-06-01T15:50:00Z</dc:date>     <dc:type>News Item</dc:type>   </item>     <item rdf:about="https://plone.org/products/plone/security/advisories/CVE-2011-1948">     <title>Security vulnerability announcement: CVE-2011-1948 \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd A reflected cross site scripting vulnerability</title>     <link>https://plone.org/products/plone/security/advisories/CVE-2011-1948</link>     <description>A vulnerability in all Plone versions that allows specially crafted URLs to return arbitrary content.</description>          <dc:publisher>No publisher</dc:publisher>     <dc:creator></dc:creator>     <dc:rights></dc:rights>     <dc:date>2011-06-01T15:50:00Z</dc:date>     <dc:type>News Item</dc:type>   </item>     <item rdf:about="https://plone.org/products/plone/security/advisories/cve-2011-0720">     <title>Security vulnerability announcement: CVE-2011-0720 - Privilege escalation</title>     <link>https://plone.org/products/plone/security/advisories/cve-2011-0720</link>     <description>A vulnerability in Plone 2.5 to Plone 4.0 that allows anonymous users to gain manager access to a Plone site.</description>          <dc:publisher>No publisher</dc:publisher>     <dc:creator></dc:creator>     <dc:rights></dc:rights>     <dc:date>2011-02-01T10:20:00Z</dc:date>     <dc:type>News Item</dc:type>   </item>    </rdf:RDF>
